# Portfolio Project Setup Instructions

✅ Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

✅ Clarify Project Requirements
- Project: Recreate dhravya.dev portfolio design
- Stack: Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS

✅ Scaffold the Project
- Using Vite with React TypeScript template

✅ Customize the Project
- Implementing exact visual design from dhravya.dev
- Using placeholder content and recreated assets

✅ Install Required Extensions
- No additional extensions required

✅ Compile the Project
- Installing dependencies and running build

✅ Create and Run Task
- Dev server task created and running

✅ Launch the Project
- Development server started at http://localhost:5173

✅ Ensure Documentation is Complete
- README contains setup and deployment instructions
- DEPLOYMENT.md with multiple hosting options
- PROJECT_COMPLETE.md with full implementation summary

## Project Type
Vite + React + TypeScript portfolio website

## Stack
- Vite (build tool)
- React 18
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v3
- Framer Motion (for animations)
- Lucide React (for icons)

## Development Rules
- Using placeholder content to avoid copyright issues
- Recreating visual design, layout, and animations
- All assets will be placeholders or open-license

## Project Status: ✅ COMPLETE

All components implemented:
- Navigation with theme toggle
- Hero section with animations
- Articles section
- Projects section  
- Achievements section
- Footer
- Responsive design
- Dark/light mode
- Smooth animations

See PROJECT_COMPLETE.md for full details.
